title: Agent Frontmatter
description: Validates the YAML frontmatter of agent definition files in .project/agents/. Agents are AI personas with defined capabilities, provider preferences, permissions, and MCP server access. Maps to A2A Agent Cards.

capabilities.description: List of capabilities this agent supports (e.g., code-review, pr-review). Maps to A2A Agent Card skills.

provider.description: Preferred AI provider and model for this agent.

preferred.description: Preferred AI provider identifier (e.g., anthropic, openai).

permissions.description: Sandboxed permissions for what this agent can access.

read.description: Glob patterns for files/directories the agent can read.

write.description: Glob patterns for files/directories the agent can write.

tools.description: Tool names the agent is allowed to use.

mcp_servers.description: List of MCP server names this agent can connect to.
